Human Capital Management

You will learn about the key and contemporary issues associated with managing people in the workplace. Calling upon literature and research from across the fields of Human Resource Management, Organisational Behaviour and Employment Relations, you will learn the issues affecting the motivation and engagement of employees in the modern workplace.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Understanding how organisations are resourced with human capital. [Knowledge and Understanding, Learning, Enquiry]

+  Apply effective human resource management techniques in the process of employee resourcing, employee development, pay and performance management . [Knowledge and Understanding, Application]

+  Demonstrate an understanding of key theories that underpin effective human behaviour in the workplace, and how they are applied. [Knowledge and Understanding, Application, Communication]
